product_overview: GC Video Analysis Hub is a video quality assurance platform that enables users to upload videos and leverage AI-powered analysis to automatically detect subtitle and other video-related errors, supplemented with manual comment capabilities.
core_goals: Enable effortless video upload and management.
Provide an advanced video player with AI analysis integration.
Automate detection of video subtitle errors using Google Gemini AI.
Allow users to add and view manual timestamped comments alongside AI results.
Support project and team management features for collaboration.
Ensure smooth navigation and intuitive user experience.
key_features: Video upload interface with file selection and start analysis capability.
Advanced video player with playback controls, timeline navigation, and fullscreen support.
AI Analysis workflow triggered from the video player, showing progress states (uploading, analyzing).
Results sidebar showing AI-detected errors and human comments with timestamp navigation.
Manual comment input supporting immediate display and time association.
Project management dashboard with project CRUD, filtering, sorting, and sharing functionalities.
Global search across projects to facilitate quick access.
Team management for managing members, roles, and permissions.
User settings management including profile, notifications, appearance, and security.
Storage overview showing usage and file categories.
user_flow_summary: User uploads a video file via the Upload Page and starts the analysis process.
User is redirected to the Video Player page where the video plays locally.
User initiates AI analysis by clicking 'Start AI Analysis' triggering a progress bar with upload and analysis states.
AI detected errors and human comments appear in the Results Sidebar with clickable cards to seek specific timestamps.
User can add manual comments via input field which are instantly displayed in the error/comments list.
Users can manage projects, teams, notifications, and settings through respective dedicated pages and UI components.
validation_criteria: Video upload succeeds and allows file selection before analysis.
Video player plays uploaded videos with full playback and timeline controls.
AI Analysis triggers correctly and displays progress states in the UI.
Results sidebar populates with AI detected errors and human comments correctly.
Clicking on error or comment seeks corresponding video timestamp accurately.
Manual comments are added and displayed immediately.
Project CRUD operations (create, rename, delete, share) function without errors.
Search functionality reliably returns relevant projects.
Team management accurately modifies roles and permissions.
Settings changes persist and reflect in user experience.
Storage usage data is accurate and updates appropriately.
